front.title: cite-as: A Link Relation to Convey a Preferred URI for Referencing

abstract.t: A web resource is routinely referenced by means of the URI with which it is directly accessed. But cases exist where referencing a resource by means of a URI, different than that access URI, is preferred. This specification defines a link relation type that can be used to convey such a preference. Note to Readers Please discuss this draft on the ART mailing list (<https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/art>).
